questions.quote: I once told a woman that I really enjoy spending time with my family.
Yes, about how you're very jealous of George. How you wished it was you who were getting married instead of him.
Well, well, look at you. It?s a little skimpy there isn't it?
Okay, just take off those pants now, and I'll work the hamstring.
I don't know. I just worry about trips like this. It's a lot of pressure.
Uh, heading out. Jerry really hates to miss the coming attractions.
Alright, I said I had a good time and I'd call, but who takes that literally?
Well. Sounds like things are progressing. Do I hear, wedding bells?
Maybe I'll stick around and see what she's wearing today. Or not wearing, if you know what I mean.
Uh, well, you know, a coffee grinder is nice. Or a coffee maker. Everyone likes coffee. Anything to do with coffee. Maybe you should go get some coffee.
